title: ils设置自然伤害调控无效
author: 子德
txt_content:
比如下面那段儿，我把fire的damage无论改成多少，每次都还是扣10%血。中毒也是10%.
environmentalDamage:
#自然伤害调控
#这里的伤害是按原本的20血为比例扣血的
  block_explosion:
  #方块爆炸
    damage: 20
    #伤害值
    durabilityLost: 40
    #装备耐久消耗
  cactus:
  #仙人掌
    damage: 5
    durabilityLost: 10
  drowning:
  #溺水
    damage: 10
    durabilityLost: 0
  entity_explosion:
    damage: 20
    durabilityLost: 40
  fall:
  #高空跌落
    damage: 12
    durabilityLost: 20
  fire:
  #火
    damage: 5
    durabilityLost: 10
  fire_tick:
  #火虫？
    damage: 5
    durabilityLost: 6
  lava:
  #岩浆
    damage: 20
    durabilityLost: 30
  lightning:
  #闪电
    damage: 25
    durabilityLost: 60
  magic:
  #法术
    damage: 5
    durabilityLost: 3
  poison:
  #中毒
    damage: 5
    durabilityLost: 2
  starvation:
  #饥饿
    damage: 5
    durabilityLost: 0
  suffocation:
  #窒息
    damage: 5
    durabilityLost: 0
  thorns:
  #荆棘
    damage: 2
    durabilityLost: 4
  damage:
  #攻击伤害
    durabilityLost: 1
potions:
#药水配置
  instantHealthI: 15
#设置瞬间生命回复药水I回复的生命百分值
  instantHealthII: 35
#设置瞬间生命回复药水II回复的生命百分值
  splashHealthI: 15
#设置瞬间生命回复药水II(溅射)回复的生命百分值
  splashHealthII: 35
#设置瞬间生命回复药水II(溅射)回复的生命百分值
